message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $13,000 to start. What do you think?
I really like the product, but $13,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget concerns, but the product is truly worth more. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $11,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll go with $9,500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  It seems like we both see the value in this product.  To make this happen, I'm willing to come down to $10,500.  This is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm getting close to my budget, but I still need to make a bit more of a concession. I'm willing to meet you at $9,800, but I'm not sure if I can go any higher. Can you meet me at this price?
